name: 4 Days With Babymouse
description:
❤❤ A cute and short game about exploring Babymouse’s room. ❤❤

Directions: 

You’ll spend four days in Babymouse’s room! Things will disappear and appear, go to the party hat to get a hint on what has changed. Don’t forget to have fun!

- Arrow Keys to move.

- Enter to interact.

- Shift to run.

Extra + Spoilers:

Hello. I am SuagrChip and this was my first game ever made and it was made in two weeks. I had a very short time limit, sorry if there are any mistakes. All criticism is needed and welcome! I made all the sprites, dialogue, and artwork in the game, but everything else belongs to their respective owners.

The characters of Babymouse belong to Jennifer L. Holm & Matthew Holm.

Thank you for playing my unofficial Babymouse fan-game.
